Source.Name: opentofu
Source.Summary: OpenTofu lets you declaratively manage your cloud infrastructure.
Source.Description: OpenTofu is an OSS tool for building, changing, and versioning infrastructure safely and efficiently. OpenTofu can manage existing and popular service providers as well as custom in-house solutions.
